Donor Log-In Information Packet.description: Initial paperwork containing donor log-in information, typically Templates 195 and 196
Donor Log-In Information Packet.extraction_prompt: Extract all information from the Donor Log-In Information Packet including donor identification, timestamps, and any administrative details.

Donor Information.description: Basic demographic and identification information about the donor
Donor Information.extraction_prompt: Extract donor name, age, gender, date of birth, and any other demographic information.

Donor Risk Assessment Interview.description: Comprehensive interview covering medical history, social history, and risk factors
Donor Risk Assessment Interview.extraction_prompt: Extract all questions and answers from the Donor Risk Assessment Interview, including medical history, social history, travel history, and any risk factors identified.

sections.Medical History: Questions and answers about medical conditions
sections.Social History: Questions about lifestyle, travel, and social factors
sections.Risk Factors: Any identified risk factors for disease transmission
sections.Additional Information: Any other relevant information from the interview

Physical Assessment.description: Physical examination findings of the donor
Physical Assessment.extraction_prompt: Extract all physical examination findings including vital signs, body measurements, visible abnormalities, and any notable physical characteristics.

sections.Vital Signs: Blood pressure, heart rate, temperature, respiratory rate
sections.Physical Findings: Any abnormal physical findings or observations
sections.General Appearance: General appearance and condition of the donor

Medical Records Review Summary.description: Summary of medical records reviewed for the donor
Medical Records Review Summary.extraction_prompt: Extract summary of medical records reviewed including diagnoses, procedures, medications, and any significant medical history documented in records.

sections.Significant History: Any significant medical history from records

Tissue Recovery Information.description: Information about the tissue recovery process
Tissue Recovery Information.extraction_prompt: Extract all information about tissue recovery including tissues recovered, recovery procedures, timing, special handling requirements, and recovery location details.

sections.Tissues Recovered: List of tissues that were recovered
sections.Special Handling: Any special handling or storage requirements
sections.Recovery Location: Location where recovery occurred including: facility_name (name of facility), facility_address (address), hospital_name (hospital name if applicable), recovery_site (specific recovery site)

Plasma Dilution.description: Information about plasma dilution procedures and measurements
Plasma Dilution.extraction_prompt: Extract all information about plasma dilution including dilution factors, volumes, procedures, and any related measurements.

Authorization for Tissue Donation.description: Authorization and consent forms for tissue donation
Authorization for Tissue Donation.extraction_prompt: Extract all information from authorization forms including who authorized the donation, date of authorization, type of authorization, and any conditions or restrictions.

sections.Conditions: Any conditions or restrictions on the authorization

Infectious Disease Testing.description: Results from infectious disease testing performed on the donor
Infectious Disease Testing.extraction_prompt: Extract all infectious disease test results including test names, dates, results, laboratory information, and sample information. For each test, extract the test name, result, specimen date/time, specimen type, test method, and any comments. Also extract detailed laboratory information including laboratory name, address, phone, fax, FDA number, CLIA number, category, ASHI certification, and client information. Extract sample information including sample date, sample time, sample type, and report generation date.

sections.Test Results: Individual test results with names and outcomes. For each test, extract: Test_Result (or Test Result), Specimen_Date_Time (or Specimen Date-Time), Specimen_Type (or Specimen Type), Test_Method (or Test Method), and Comments (or Comment)
sections.Laboratory Information: Detailed laboratory information including: testing_laboratory (laboratory name), laboratory_address (address), phone (phone number), fax (fax number), fda (FDA registration number), clia (CLIA certification number), category (laboratory category), ashi (ASHI certification if applicable), client (client name or identifier)
sections.Sample Information: Sample collection information including: sample_date (date when sample was collected), sample_time (time when sample was collected), sample_type_1 and sample_type_2 (types of samples collected), report_generated (date when report was generated)
sections.Additional Notes: Any additional notes or comments about the tests

Medical Records.description: Complete medical records from hospitals or healthcare facilities
Medical Records.extraction_prompt: Extract comprehensive information from medical records including admission notes, discharge summaries, progress notes, laboratory results, imaging reports, vital signs, and any other clinical documentation. Pay special attention to blood pressure readings and hypotension status.

sections.Admission Information: Admission notes and initial assessments including admission diagnoses (Admission_Diagnoses)
sections.Laboratory Results: Laboratory test results (Laboratory_Results) including WBC, Hemoglobin, Platelets, Creatinine, and other lab values
sections.Vital Signs: Vital signs including blood pressure readings. Extract hypotension_status (Yes/No/Present/None) if hypotension is mentioned or if blood pressure readings indicate hypotension (systolic < 90 mmHg)

Autopsy Report.description: Autopsy report if an autopsy was performed
Autopsy Report.extraction_prompt: Extract all information from the autopsy report including cause of death, findings, organ examination results, and any pathological diagnoses.

sections.Cause of Death: Primary and contributing causes of death
sections.Organ Examination: Results of examination of individual organs

Toxicology Report.description: Toxicology report if toxicology testing was performed
Toxicology Report.extraction_prompt: Extract all information from the toxicology report including substances tested, results, concentrations, and any interpretation or conclusions.

sections.Substances Tested: List of substances or drugs tested
sections.Interpretation: Interpretation or conclusions from the toxicology results

Skin Dermal Cultures.description: Skin dermal culture results if skin recovery was performed
Skin Dermal Cultures.extraction_prompt: Extract all information about skin dermal cultures including culture sites, microorganisms identified, results, and any categorization.

sections.Culture Sites: Sites where skin cultures were taken

Bioburden Results.description: Bioburden testing results if fresh tissue processing was performed
Bioburden Results.extraction_prompt: Extract all information about bioburden testing including test methods, results, microbial counts, and any interpretation.
